review:
Dr.Praveen Reddy is hair transplant surgeon. During my visit to the clinic, he clearly explains about the reasons for my hairfall. The way he explained about the process makes me to understand about the process. He gave full confidence and strength to patients that doctors were there for my treatment. They treated me with utmost care. I would like thank to team who made this transplant surgery to me.
Today is my first day after the treatment. Waiting for new me ‚ò∫Ô∏è. I am completely satisfied and strongly recommended this care for hair transplantation.

Thanks, 
Ashok Kumar Reddy M

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I went to hair sure clinic today. Doctor patiently explained me about everything. I asked him about hair transplant surgery, PRP, Minoxidil and if I can wear toupee for sometime and ditch it later. He explained everything very well and never pressured me to go for hair surgery right away. He asked me to wait for the surgery and told that this is not a disease and you can really give it a thought. Although, the price of hair transplant is not in my budget but the transplant process shown by doctor Praveen and before after of the patients were really amazing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a great experience with HairSure w.r.t my FUE + BHT operation. Dr. Pravin and the staff showed great care and concern throughout the process and I'm glad that I picked the right clinic.

Even though I was initially hesitant about the thought of FUE surgery, I decided to go for the initial consultation. During the consultation, Dr. Pravin walked me through the process and addressed all of my concerns and questions patiently through the progress pictures of other patients.

My major concerns were possible scarring, recovery time and natural looking hairline. When I was satisfied with all the responses, i decided to move forward.

Its been 14 days since my surgery and I can personally vouch that all the above-mentioned concerns were thoroughly addressed. I'm happy with my results so far and I wish I had taken the decision earlier.

Thanks to the entire team of doctors who took care of me on the day of surgery and huge shout out to all the support staff at the clinic. I was super impressed with their hospitality and genuine concern for my well-being and recovery. .

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctors are very friendly. I would strongly recommend people who are decide to hair transplant . Just blindly visit hair sure transplant centre. They will worth your money and their guidance is awesome. All the stafff from receptionist to doctors are awesome. I hope you will get better result like me. @sreedhar,@sashikanth@praveen reddy thanks for your work and contribution. All the best future aspirations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First of all Thank you for your support and assistance given to me by Dr.Praveen Reddy sir. I have visited many doctors and hospitals for transplantation Sergury but I didn't get satisfaction with their explanation. In Hair sure they will explain the position of your hair or any problems regarding the issue transparently. If it is possible they will say yes if not they will say no. In my case Dr.Praveen Reddy sir and Dr.V.Shashikanth sir took extreme care before and after the Sergury. The support they give after Sergury is awesome. Iam really satisfied with Hair sure. I suggest it is the best in Hyderabad. Value formoney. 
Thankyou Hair sure team and Special thanks to Dr.Praveen Reddy sir and Dr.V.Shashikanth sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having hair loss issue from 6 years and lost most of the frontal hair, Dr. Praveen Reddy sir gave a detailed explanation of the problem and suggested to go with hair transplant/restoration surgery. I was bit nervous initially, but came up to try it. On the day of surgery, Dr. Ravi chander, Dr. Sridhar,  Dr. Shashikanth and Dr. Praveen along with other staff like Sai etc.. made it a cool and fun environment. The surgery went easy with no pain. As of today I am done with 14 days and everything's fine. I am happy with the result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Excellent... Thank you.. I got know the Hair sure Transplantation from my uncle, he was doctor, his friend transplanted hair for him  in Hiar Sure, he got good result and he is doctor also then my uncle said to me go to Hair sure and contact Dr. Praveen Reddy sir, Dr Praveen Reddy sir team did hair Transplantation for him, so I went to Hair sure, I am little bit nervous and tenced when am going to meet Dr. Praveen sir,  but Dr. Explained about the procedure and everything clearly then will get confident. Dr. Praveen sir and Team did operation excellent and cool, they a re very professional and passionate on fo their work.. Technically they are experts. Am posting on 5th day now after operation, will post the details again after the results asap.. Thank you so much to Dr. Praveen sir and Team.
